name: 喜帕恰斯
bio_short: 古希腊天文学家、数学家，被誉为“古希腊最伟大的天文学家”。他发现了岁差，编制了第一部科学星表，并发明了三角学。
bio_short_en: An ancient Greek astronomer and mathematician, considered the greatest astronomical observer of antiquity. He discovered precession, compiled the first scientific star catalog, and is credited with inventing trigonometry.
